title: Dinosaurs: the terrible lizards
creator_credit: Wah Chang and Charles Cahill and Associates
brief_description: Uses special effects and models to recreate the age of the dinosaurs. Gives an overview of what they looked like, what they ate, and how they lived and died. Suitable for lower and upper primary levels.
creator_credit_for_label: Wah Chang and Charles Cahill and Associates
